segments.text: It's nice to meet you . Thanks for coming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wanted to meet with you to discuss your daughter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is she acting up in class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . She's a joy to have in my class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So she isn't causing you any problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . She is actually very intelligent and well behaved .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad to know that you like her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have nothing to worry about with her .
segments.speaker: S2
